Reviews.Title: “One week in rome”
Reviews.Author: Bel Hassine T
Reviews.Content: spent 15 days vacation italy florence rome rented cesare apartment family 4 located narrow street chance park apartment offers private car welcomed owners friendly information help visit rome apartment clean equipped holiday owners building sun deck wooden floor gazebos ready april strongly suggest recommend vacation rome

Reviews.Title: “La Piazzetta di Rome”
Reviews.Author: Deborah C
Reviews.Content: apartment stayed 3 nights spacious clean courtyard lovely welcomed lots information helpful 10 mins metro shops meant accessible prior trip answered questions arranged pick airport meant worry thank

Reviews.Title: “Piazzetta Apartment”
Reviews.Author: huler s
Reviews.Content: hi 2 friends stayed 4 nights beautiful la apartment 1 double 1 twin spacious clean greeted lovely warm welcome plenty information ie restaurants shops metro 10 mins walk metro 3 stops rome book rome bookcase found useful massimo helpful arranging checkin time booked private car airport departure enjoyed highly recommend apartment lovely quiet convenient amenities sincerely

Reviews.Title: “A lovely apartment”
Reviews.Author: manrique d
Reviews.Content: apartment nice clean furnished spacious close via aurelia busy street narrow street silent living bright shops metro station walking 10 minutes excelente

HotelInfo.Name: La Piazzetta di Roma
HotelInfo.Address: Via Ilario Alibrandi, 24 A, 00165 Rome, Italy
